## DEV LOG

I am trying to create Tags Pages for my 'Blog Posts' aka *Projects*. I am using [the official Gatsby Docs Tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/adding-tags-and-categories-to-blog-posts/). This tutorial has the following steps:

1. [ ] Add tags to your markdown files
1. [ ] Write a query to get all tags for your posts
1. [ ] Make a tags page template (for /tags/{tag})
1. [ ] Modify gatsby-node.js to render pages using that template
1. [ ] Make a tags index page (/tags) that renders a list of all tags
1. [ ] (optional) Render tags inline with your blog posts
